author: IGN
description: Check out the ‘Until The World Ends’ Trailer for Permafrost, an action co-op survival game developed by SpaceRocket Games. Players will head out into the frigid world to hunt, craft, and reclaim what remains alone or with friends in co-op mode. Permafrost is coming soon to PC (Steam, GoG, and Epic Games Store).
title: Permafrost - Official ‘Until The World Ends’ Trailer

author: IGN
description: Grand Theft Auto 6 has been delayed again, this time to November 2026. That will cause problems for all sorts of fall 2026 games, such as Halo: Campaign Evolved, Gears of War: E-day, Fable, Wolverine, and more. Let's dig in on this week's Next-Gen Console Watch.
title: GTA 6 Just Blew Up Fall 2026 - Next-Gen Console Watch

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Helheim Map Closed Alpha 4 Trailer for Gods, Death, & Reapers, an extraction hack-and-slash RPG developed by Wolcen Studio. Players will be able to access a new Closed Alpha that brings a new Helheim map, The Unworthy faction, expanded skills and crafting systems, and the long-awaited Story Mode for players to enjoy. The Helheim Map and Closed Alpha 4 kicks off on November 20 for PC (Steam).

#IGN #gaming
title: Gods, Death, & Reapers - Official Helheim Map Closed Alpha 4 Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Battlefield 6’s free-to-play Battle Royale mode has finally been announced and released. REDSEC features its very own map set on the devastated coast of California, and while the fundamentals of Battlefield shine through here, it’s also a very distinct and separate competitive experience compared to the normal multiplayer modes. We’re here to break down these 18 essential tips to help you get the win in Battlefield REDSEC.

Check out our written guide on IGN.com for more help with Battlefield 6 and REDSEC.
https://www.ign.com/wikis/battlefield-redsec

Timestamps:
00:00 - Intro
00:29 - 1: Class Recommendations
01:26 - 2: Where To Drop
02:39 - 3: Gear Up ASAP
03:05 - 4: How to Use Upgrade Kits
03:29 - 5: Movement Tips
04:13 - 6: Walk, Don’t (Always) Run
04:44 - 7: Always Spot Enemies
04:59 - 8: Melee Takedown for Enemy Locations
05:16 - 9: Vehicle Loot
05:48 - 10: Gold Weapon Locations
06:10 - 11: Missions
06:42 - 12: …and Countermissions
07:13 - 13: PVP Risk
07:40 - 14: Incidental Coun
title: Battlefield REDSEC - 18 Essential Tips and Tricks

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Nintendo Switch 2 Edition Announcement Trailer for Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds, the hit arcade racing game developed by SEGA. Players will go for victory across a suite of tracks and racers on the Nintendo Switch 2 Edition, fitted with faster framerates, improved resolution, and more features to accommodate Nintendo's latest hardware. Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds is launching on December 4 for Nintendo Switch 2, with the game available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC.

#IGN #gaming
title: Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds - Official Nintendo Switch 2 Edition Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss The Replacer 'Airport Security' Trailer for Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, the latest addition to the first-person shooter franchise developed by Treyarch. Even the TSA must make time for the latest Call of Duty, enlisting The Replacers to ensure safe travels for all passengers by any means necessary. Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 is launching on November 14 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 - Official The Replacer 'Airport Security' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Arc Raiders is one of the biggest multiplayer hits of the year, which means thousands of people are flocking to it. That said, it can be a little obtuse with some of its mechanics, opting to throw players into the heat of a match instead of spending too much time over-explaining things. If you need some advice on what to do to start making it back to Speranza with heaps of great loot, don’t worry, we’ve got you covered. Here are 12 essential tips for Arc Raiders.

0:00 - Intro
0:26 - Your Goal Is To Survive, Not Win
1:14 - Complete Quests in the Early Hours
1:48 - Turn on the 'Night Mode' Audio Setting
2:56 - Remember to Switch Sides When Aiming
3:33 - Be Thoughtful With Your Skill Points
4:13 - Get the In-Round Crafting Skill
4:57 - Trade Free Loadout Augments for Other Augments
5:38 - Use the Ping to Identify Enemies
6:31 - Shoot ARC In Their Weak Spots
7:28 - Dismantle Guns for Parts
8:00 - Don't Neglect Scrappy
8:31 - Don't Forget About Prox Chat

#IGN #gaming
title: Arc Raiders - 12 Essential Tips To Keep You Alive

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Robot Fighter Deep Dive Trailer for Invincible VS, the hit action fighting game based on the hit comic and TV series developed by Quarter Up. Players can get the rundown on the moveset, abilities, and techniques of Robot. While not street smart, Robot is able to get quick hits off against opponents in Invincible VS, coming soon to PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #gaming
title: Invincible VS - Official Robot Fighter Deep Dive Trailer

#IGN #Gaming #Nintendo

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Launch Trailer for Amanda The Adventurer 3, an exploration puzzle interaction horror game developed by MangledMaw Games. Players will experience the finale in the epic horror trilogy as Riley uncovers deep truths about Amanda, Hameln, and a plague affecting the town of Kensdale. Solve escape-room puzzles, explore the abandoned Hameln facility, and more in Amanda The Adventurer 3, available now for PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Amanda The Adventurer 3 - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The Sherriff of Nottingham (played by Game of Thrones' Sean Bean) receives word that Robin Hood, Son of Loxley, has killed the leader of his knightsmen in this exclusive clip from the third episode of Season 1.

The MGM+ series Robin Hood premiered Sunday, November 2 at 9:00 PM ET/PT in the U.S. with two episodes and new episodes will premiere weekly through the season finale on Sunday, December 28, 2025.

Robin Hood brings a modern energy to the classic tale of the roguish outlaw hero who stole from the rich and gave to the poor, and the epic love story between him and a courageous and daring Marian. It is a smart, sweeping, romantic adventure that brings historical authenticity, psychological depth, and a heightened focus on the relationship between Rob and Marian to the beloved story. 

Following the Norman invasion of England, Rob – a Saxon forester’s son – and Marian, the daughter of a Norman lord – fall in love and work together to fight for justice and freedom. As Rob rises as
title: Robin Hood - Season 1, Episode 3 Exclusive Clip (2025) Sean Bean

author: IGN
description:
What if the 1980's became the jumping off point for the future? Like how this year's Fantastic Four movie was a '50's version of the future? Enter ROUTINE, an upcoming first-person sci-fi horror game set on a lunar base. Like all good horror games, silence and loneliness are your worst enemies, and that's true in ROUTINE – except for the part where you discover a foe who thinks the primary threat is, in fact, you. Piece together the events that took place prior to your arrival, and try to survive.

ROUTINE is our IGN First "cover story" game for November, ahead of its December 4 release for PC (Steam and Xbox on PC) and Xbox (Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, and Xbox Cloud) – including Xbox Game Pass on day one. This exclusive video (watch it above) introduces you to the Megazone Arcade area of the lunar base, including playable minigames. Wishlist ROUTINE on Steam if you're interested:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/606160/ROUTINE/

#IGN
title: ROUTINE: Meet the Megazone Arcade and Playable Minigames – IGN First

author: IGN
description:
Check out the new Percy Jackson and the Olympians trailer for Season 2 of the action-adventure series. The second season of Percy Jackson and the Olympians stars Walker Scobell, Leah Sava Jeffries, Aryan Simhadri, Charlie Bushnell, Dior Goodjohn and Daniel Diemer. 

After Camp Half-Blood’s protective border is breached, Percy Jackson embarks on an epic odyssey into the Sea of Monsters in search of his best friend Grover and the one thing that may save the camp — the legendary Golden Fleece. With help from Annabeth, Clarisse and his newfound cyclops half-brother Tyson, Percy’s survival becomes essential to stopping Luke, the Titan Kronos, and their impending plan to bring down Camp Half-Blood — and ultimately, Olympus. 

Season 2 of Percy Jackson and the Olympians premieres December 10, with a two-episode debut on Disney+ and Hulu, with new episodes rolling out every Wednesday.

#IGN #PercyJacksonAndTheOlympians #PercyJacksonSeason2
title: Percy Jackson and The Olympians: Season 2 - Official Trailer (2025) Walker Scobell

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Bruce Lee 85th Anniversary Trailer for Hitman World of Assassination, the hit stealth action assassination game developed by IO Interactive. 

Players must track down and take out those who wish to put the legendary martial arts master Bruce Lee into a permanent end. Work alongside Bruce Lee to take out a Hong Kong-based powerful criminal syndicate in the Bruce Lee Elusive Target Mission, available now through November 20 on PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #Hitman #BruceLee
title: Hitman World of Assassination - Official Bruce Lee 85th Anniversary Trailer

author: IGN
description:
A violent, reckless samurai is shipwrecked on a desolate island, stripped of any outlet for his rage. As he embarks on a punishing spiritual journey to quiet his turbulent mind, the line between meditation and madness begins to blur. When external demons—manifesting as flesh-hungry cannibals—abduct him, his grip on reality and mastery of the blade are tested in ways he never imagined.

The cast includes Shogen, Keigo Sunagawa, Yuma Sunagawa, and Sumire Ashina.

The film is written, directed and produced by Josh C. Waller. Well Go USA will release Lone Samurai in select theaters and available via Video On Demand on December 12, 2025.
title: Lone Samurai: Exclusive Trailer (2025) Shogen, Keigo Sunagawa

description:
Check out the Tides of Torment Expansion Release Date Trailer for Total War: Warhammer 3, a turn-based strategy game developed by Creative Assembly and Feral Interactive. 

Players will soon be able to access the Tides of Torment Expansion, packed with new Legendary Lords and new content to unlock. The Tides of Torment Expansion for Total War: Warhammer 3 launches on December 4 for PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #Warhammer #TotalWarWarhammer3
title: Total War: Warhammer 3 - Official Tides of Torment Expansion Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Accolades Trailer for Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake, a collection of two classic RPG's remade in the HD-2D format developed by Square Enix. 

Embark on a timeless adventure in the first two installments of The Erdrick Trilogy, fitted with enhancements and features for the modern era. Don't miss the latest trailer to garner the critical reception behind Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake, available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #DragonQuestHD2D #RetroRPG
title: Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake - Official Accolades Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Two new Pokémon Legends: Z-A trailer are here, unveiling the release date for the Mega Dimension DLC and giving a deeper dive into the new adventure. Check out the latest Pokémon Legends: Z-A: Mega Dimension DLC trailers for the action RPG, and get a peek at the new dimension you'll explore: Hyperspace Lumiose. Hyperspace Lumiose is home to Pokémon you won't find in Lumiose City, and its Pokémon can also have hyperspace levels that bring their total levels over the normal limit of Lv. 100.


Want a closer look at the Mega Dimension? The second Pokémon Legends: Z-A Mega Dimension trailer has you covered, as it gives you a deeper dive into the story! In the Mega Dimension DLC, just when Team MZ's efforts seem to have restored peace to Lumiose City, something strange begins to happen when mysterious distortions start forming around town. Meet a new character, Ansha and her Pokémon Hoopa, and dive into the Mega Dimension with Team MZ on a new adventure. The trailer also introduces you to
title: Nintendo Drops 2 Pokémon Legends: Z-A – Mega Dimension Trailers! - What Do You Think?

author: IGN
description: Get a 14-minute look at gameplay from Drifter, the newest Survivor coming to third-person roguelite Risk of Rain 2 in its Alloyed Collective expansion pack on November 18 for PC, PlayStation, and Xbox (the Nintendo Switch version will come along later). The Drifter brings the best of her Brawler-Support kit, along with some exciting new additions. Players looking to master Drifter will need to manage her unique Junk resource, the key to unlocking the full potential of her most powerful abilities. Learn more and/or wishlist the expansion on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2781620/Risk_of_Rain_2_Alloyed_Collective/
title: Risk of Rain 2: Alloyed Collective – Exclusive Drifter Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Sony has a long history of bizarre marketing for PlayStation, with some of the most memorable being David Lynch’s nightmarish PS2 commercials. The latest PlayStation ad campaign leans on the slogan “It Happens on PS5,” but then proceeds to show off people in extraordinary situations that we can’t recall ever actually… happening in PS5 games? Still, it’s a fun way of selling the escapism of gaming, and as weird as it is, it’s a lot less confusing than Xbox’s current habit of saying everything is an Xbox, including Xboxes, but also a bunch of stuff that isn’t an Xbox. 

This weeks show is Mas Scoville, Brian Altano, and is produced by Nick Maillet
title: PlayStation's New Ads Are Bringing Back PS2-Era Weirdness - Beyond Clips

author: IGN
description:
Get a closer look at Cash Cleaner Simulator in this latest trailer for the upcoming simulation game. The new Cash Cleaner Simulator trailer shows your objectives and what you can expect. Check it, clean it, sort it, ship it. 

Welcome to the life of a cash cleaner. Take jobs from underworld contacts and clean some cash. Just don't try to leave. Cash Cleaner Simulator is out now on PC, and coming to PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X/S on February 12, 2026.

#IGN #CashCleaner #SimulationGame
title: Cash Cleaner Simulator - Official Console Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Two iconic Konami characters are coming to Dead by Daylight. Watch the latest Dead by Daylight trailer for the asymmetrical multiplayer horror game to see what's coming with the 2v8 game mode, which features Silent Hill's Pyramid Head and Castlevania's Dracula for a limited time. Silent Hill's Pyramid Head and Castlevania's Dracula--known within The Fog as The Executioner and The Dark Lord--arrive in the 2v8 Trials, as they will hunt side by side during the event, which runs from November 6 through November 20, 2025.

The event grants all players entering the 2v8 queue access to four free characters for the duration of its run. Silent Hill survivor Cheryl Mason and Castlevania's legendary vampire hunter Trevor Belmont also join, each unlocked and available for all to play throughout the event. 

The Dead by Daylight's 2v8 update also introduces 4 new Outfits inspired by Konami's legendary characters, including a Legendary Outfit for Trevor Belmont that brings his descendant, the power
title: Dead by Daylight - Official 2v8: Silent Hill x Castlevania Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Teaser Trailer for Michael, a drama biography telling the tale of one of humanity's greatest musicians, the King of Pop, Michael Jackson, distributed by Lionsgate. Michael is in theaters on April 24, 2026.

Michael will bring audiences a riveting and honest portrayal of the brilliant yet complicated man who became the King of Pop. The film presents his triumphs and tragedies on an epic, cinematic scale — from his human side and personal struggles to his undeniable creative genius, exemplified by his most iconic performances. As never before, audiences will experience an inside look into one of the most influential, trailblazing artists the world has ever known.

Michael stars Jaafar Jackson, Nia Long, with Miles Teller and Colman Domingo. The film is directed by Antoine Fuqua, alongside being produced by Graham King, John Branca, and John McClain.

Michael is in theaters on April 24, 2026.

#IGN #MichaelMovie #MichaelJackson
title: Michael - Official Teaser Trailer (2026) Jaafar Jackson, Nia Long, Miles Teller

author: IGN
description:
How accurately can video games depict being at sea? Who better to ask the Royal Navy themselves ⁠– we got Royal Navy esports team members LH Morgan and LH Woolley to react to a number of nautical video games, including Battlefield 3, Bioshock and Assassin’s Creed IV: Black Flag, and give their assessment on what it’s really like out at sea. Sponsored by the Royal Navy.

Subscribe to IGN for more!
http://www.youtube.com/user/IGNentertainment?sub_confirmation=1

#IGN #RoyalNavy
title: We asked the Royal Navy to react to gaming depictions of life at sea. #sponsored

author: IGN
description:
Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment reviewed by Logan Plant on Nintendo Switch 2.

The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom left a lot of unanswered questions perfect for exploring in a prequel, but Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment isn’t all that interested in answering them. What it is interested in is weaving together iconic mechanics from its source material to deliver the best musou action the series has seen yet. It constantly rewards your knowledge of Tears of the Kingdom through clever, often hilarious movesets that recontextualize abilities to fit its over-the-top action, as well as smaller payoffs like boss weaknesses that are consistent across the pair of games. Carving through thousands of enemies remains fun throughout the roughly 18-hour campaign and beyond thanks to constant upgrades, smart systems that encourage you to use a variety of characters, and great technical performance. It’s just a shame that Age of Imprisonment fails to tell a story worthy of its potent
title: Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment Review

author: IGN
description:
Check out the 'One Actor Two Minds' Featurette for Predator: Badlands, an upcoming addition to the sci-fi action thriller series distributed by 20th Century Studios. Hear from director Dan Trachtenberg and more in Predator: Badlands, in theaters on November 7.

Predator: Badlands, which stars Elle Fanning and Dimitrius Schuster-Koloamatangi, is set in the future on a remote planet, where a young Predator (Schuster-Koloamatangi), outcast from his clan, finds an unlikely ally in Thia (Fanning) and embarks on a treacherous journey in search of the ultimate adversary. The film is directed by Dan Trachtenberg and produced by John Davis, Dan Trachtenberg, Marc Toberoff, Ben Rosenblatt and Brent O’Connor.

Predator: Badlands is in theaters on November 7.
title: Predator: Badlands - Official 'One Actor Two Minds' Featurette (2025) Elle Fanning

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'Real Magic' Featurette for Now You See Me: Now You Don’t, the upcoming film starring Jesse Eisenberg, Woody Harrelson, Dave Franco, Isla Fisher, Justice Smith, Dominic Sessa, Ariana Greenblatt, with Rosamund Pike, and Morgan Freeman. Now You See Me: Now You Don’t opens in theaters on November 14, 2025.

The Four Horsemen (Jesse Eisenberg, Woody Harrelson, Dave Franco, Isla Fisher) are back — to unite with a new generation of illusionists (Justice Smith, Dominic Sessa, Ariana Greenblatt) for their most global, high-stakes magical adventure yet. Their mission: Expose the corruption of Veronika Vanderberg (Rosamund Pike), a powerful diamond heiress with ties to arms dealers, traffickers, and warlords. Aided by the legendary Thaddeus (Morgan Freeman), the two generations of magicians must overcome their differences to try and defeat their cunning and dangerous adversary, in this magic-fueled heist filled with the franchise’s signature twists, turns, and thrilling reveals —
title: Now You See Me: Now You Don't - Official 'Real Magic' Featurette (2025) Jesse Eisenberg, Isla Fisher

author: IGN
description:
Check out the '1994 Cameos' Featurette for The Fantastic Four: First Steps, the latest addition to the MCU and introduction to Marvel's first family. Hear the process from the filmmakers at Marvel Studios on paying homage to the 1994 iteration of a Fantastic Four film that remained unreleased which starred Alex Hyde-White, Jay Underwood, Rebecca Staab, and Michael Bailey-Smith. The Fantastic Four: First Steps is streaming on Disney+ now.

The Fantastic Four: First Steps stars Pedro Pascal, Vanessa Kirby, Joseph Quinn, Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Ralph Ineson, and Julia Garner.

Set against the vibrant backdrop of a 1960s-inspired, retro- futuristic world, Marvel Studios’ The Fantastic Four: First Steps introduces Marvel’s First Family—Reed Richards/Mister Fantastic (Pedro Pascal), Sue Storm/Invisible Woman (Vanessa Kirby), Johnny Storm/Human Torch (Joseph Quinn) and Ben Grimm/The Thing (Ebon Moss-Bachrach) as they face their most daunting challenge yet. Forced to balance their roles as heroes
title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps - Official '1994 Cameos' Behind the Scenes Clip (2025)

author: IGN
description: Watch the Commando Update Launch Trailer for Kiborg, a roguelike action beat 'em up RPG developed by Sobaka Studio. Players can now access a new update for the game, bringing new game modes, arenas, rewards, implants, and more, packed with the Commando Update. The Commando Update for Kiborg is available now for PC (Steam), with a release on PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, and Xbox Series X|S at a later date.
title: Kiborg - Official Commando Update Launch Trailer
